Literature.Title: Systematically Studying the Optimal Amino Acid Distribution Patterns of the Amphiphilic Structure by Using the Ultrashort Amphiphiles
Literature.Author: He S, Yang Z, Yu W, Li J, Li Z, Wang J, Shan A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(MIC=>64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli K99(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli 078(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>64µM),Bacillus subtilis CMCC 63501(MIC=8µM),Bacillus subtilis CMCC 63501(MBC=16µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>64µM),Listeria monocytogenes CGMCC 1.1075(MIC=>64µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(0-10% Killing=64µM)
